mrgsim.parallel 0.2.0

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

mrgsim.parallel 0.2.02022-01-30

  • Add bg_mrgsim_d() to simulate data sets in background R processes (#16)

  • Add new_stream() to create file stream objects (#16)

  • Add tools for manipulating file stream objects: locate_stream(), format_stream(), ext_stream() (#16)

  • Add file_set() as a lower-level function for creating file sets (#16)

  • Add write_stream() generic and methods for writing fst, feather, qs, rds file formats (#16)

  • Add utilities for managing locker storage space: setup_locker(), reset_locker(), noreset_locker(), version_locker() (#16)

  • Add some utility functions for working with outputs written in fst format: internalize_fst(), head_fst(), list_fst() (#16)

Developed by Kyle Baron.
